name: Silent Power
overview: Silent Power, Inc., a renewable technology company, manufactures and markets distributed energy storage systems for the renewable energy, electric vehicle charge station, and backup power markets. It offers integrated inverter systems and indoor standby power systems. The company also provides utility solutions, such as OnDemand energy appliance for electric utilities and their customers to integrate renewable into the distribution grids and aligning distributed renewable production peaks with the utility demand peaks. Its products are used in various applications, such as dentists, doctorsâ€™ offices, rural health clinics, restaurants, mini marts, farmers/ranchers, small businesses, office parks/developers, retail centers, daycare centers, hotels, banks, real estate offices, government agencies, radio/TV stations, red cross/emergency shelters, and schools. The company sells its products through distributors and dealers. Silent Power, Inc. was founded in 2002 and is based in Baxter, Minnesota.

funding_rounds.source_description: Silent Power Raises $2M For Energy Storage
